# Symbol of Laughter (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Charm Spells|charm]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Witch Spells|Witch 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, M (mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal worth 1,000 gp each)

**Range:** 0 ft.; see text

**Effect:** One symbol

**Duration:** See text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 196

This spell functions as *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|symbol of death]]*, except that all creatures within 60 feet are affected with uncontrollable laughter (as *[[Hideous Laughter (Spell)|hideous laughter]]*) for 1 round per caster level.

Unlike *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|symbol of death]]*, *symbol of laughter* has no hit point limit; once it is triggered, a *symbol of laughter* remains active for 1 minute per caster level.

*Symbol of laughter* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell by a caster of 10th level or higher at a cost of 5,000 gp.
